commonChangelog.description: Title for tooltip for button that redirects user to the Chrome extension's version history and changelog.

commonSupportDevelopment.description: Title for tooltip for button that redirects user to the Chrome extension's donation page.

commonHelpAndFeedback.description: Title for tooltip for button that redirects user to the Chrome extension's support hub.

commonFloatingMode.description: Title for tooltip for button that opens the Chrome extension in a separate window.

commonSettings.description: Title for tooltip for button that opens the Chrome extension's settings.

commonProfile.description: Title for tooltip for button that opens a menu with various actions relating to the user's profile.
